description: /b/Item Vaults/b/ are a mass-storage solution. Each item vault /6/stores 18 stacks/6/, making /b/3 vaults/b/ the same capacity of a /b/double chest/b/. However, additonal item vaults can be placed and connected, up to /b/81 item vaults/b/ making a /6/combined capacity of 1,458 stacks/6/.

However, /c/input and output can only be done via automation/c/. /b/Funnels/b/ or /b/Hoppers/b/ can be placed anywhere along the vault and will have /6/acess to the full capacity/6/. /6/Great for automated storage/6/, even if  a little cumbersome for storing and acessing your belongings.
/b/Fluid Tanks/b/ work similarly. A single tank /6/holds 8 buckets/6/ of liquid. /b/Up to 270 tanks/b/ can be combined, for a /6/total capacity of 2,160 buckets/6/.
Similarly, pipes can input and output anywhere along it's length.
/b/Vaults/b/ and /b/Tanks/b/ must have a square base. /b/Fluid Tanks/b/ and /b/Item Silos/b/ stack vertically, but /b/Fluid Vessels/b/ and /b/Item Vaults/b/ can be placed horizontally.
